org.qcri.rheem.core.platform

Class Junction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.platform.Junction

  • public class Junction
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes the implementation of one OutputSlot to its occupied InputSlots.

        public TimeEstimate getTimeEstimate(OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
